description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. BlindGiRl is back.  This time she is not alone. Play split-screen or with a friend to solve echo-location puzzles, and find your way through confusion to understanding.
description.short: BlindGiRl is back.  This time she is not alone. Play split-screen or with a friend to solve echo-location puzzles, and find your way through confusion to understanding.
